message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I think the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $10500. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
